text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for all APIs calls in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates>
We are currently investigating increased error rates to Elastic Beanstalk APIs in the US-EAST-1 region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 9:42 AM and 10:30 AM PDT we experienced increased error rates for API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates>
Between 9:42 AM and 10:30 AM PDT we experienced increased error rates to Elastic Beanstalk APIs in the US-EAST-1 region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
